entry.title: Bioplasma - All 12 Tissue Salts In 1 - General Tonic (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Bioplasma (180 tablets) is a blend of all the 12 tissue salts in equal proportions and is used for broad spectrum support - excellent for travelling purposes.

  • Economical! Combines all 12 tissue salts in equal proportions. One tablet equals FOUR tablets from other tissue salt brands!
  • Use daily as a supportive tonic, to maintain overall health levels, or when traveling to enhance immunity
  • Add individual tissue salts for acute conditions
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

Ingredients

Calc Fluor D6, Calc Phos D6, Calc Sulph D6, Ferrum Phos D6, Kali Mur D6, Kali Phos D6, Kali Sulph D6, Mag Phos D6, Nat Mur D6, Nat Phos D6, Nat Sulph D6 and Silicea D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Calc Phos Tissue Salt No.2 - Tissue Salts To Fortify Bone Health (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Calcium Phosphate (180 tablets) is a sugar-free tissue salt for cell and bone builder for pregnancy, growing children and bones of all ages.

  • Supplement for bone & blood disorders
  • Supports growing children in strengthening their bones, teeth & to help ease growing pains
  • Supports strong bones and joints
  • Beneficial for Osteoporosis and bone fractures
  • White and red blood cell formation
  • Prevent anaemia
  • Soothes anxiety & panic attacks
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans and Diabetics)

Ingredients

Calc Phos D6

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Calc Fluor Tissue Salt No.1 - Tissue Salt For Elasticity (60 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Calcium Fluoride (60 tablets) is a sugar-free tissue salt to maintain and restore the elasticity, flexibility and strengthening of connective tissues.

  • Supports tissue elasticity in joints, skin and the circulatory system
  • Improves skin tone as well as chapped, cracked or hardened skin
  • Promotes musculo-skeletal and joint health, suppleness and flexibility
  • Improves circulation
  • Eases varicose veins, constipation and hemorrhoids (piles)
  • Strengthens tooth enamel (excellent for babies and toddlers)
  • Encourages the body to return to normal after pregnancy, treats & prevents stretchmarks

Ingredients

Calc Fluor D6

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Calc Sulph Tissue Salt No.3 - Tissue Salt for Cleansing, Purifying & Healing (60 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Calcium Sulphate (60 tablets) is a sugar-free tissue salt that acts as a systemic cleanser, skin purifier and wound healer.

  • Strengthens and maintains the integrity of cell membranes, preventing premature cell disintegration
  • Purifies blood - helps the liver to remove decaying organic products from the blood stream
  • Assist pimples, boils, abscesses, ulcerations, slow healing wounds and tendencies to mouth ulcers
  • Helps in conditions associated with the discharge of pus
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics and animals)

Ingredients

Calc Sulph D6.

Directions for use 

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Kali Phosphate (60 tablets) is a tissue salt that supports the function of the heart and nervous system. It's a wonderful nerve tonic that promotes calmness, well-being and vitality, and assists brain power.

  • Excellent nervous system tonic for pets and humans alike
  • Relieves exhaustion, irritability & stress
  • Assists concentration, memory and age related memory-loss
  • Eases bad breath or body odour
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, animals and babies)

Ingredients

Kali Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle)

entry.title: Nat Phos Tissue Salt No.10 - Acid Neutralizer & Oily Skin (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Natrum Phosphoricum (180 tablets) acts as a pH balancer to neutralize acidity in the skin and body.

  • Maintains the alkalinity of the blood, supports the function of the kidneys and digestive system and emulsifies fatty acids
  • Helps constipation, worms & sour regurgitations (for babies too)
  • Keeps uric acid soluble
  • Relieves painful joints and gout
  • Reduces chocolate cravings and obesity
  • Combats oily skin and hair
  • Treats blackheads, pimples, acne & nappy rash
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

Ingredients

Nat Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.title: Kali Sulph Tissue Salt No.7 - Skin Care & Infections (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Kali Sulphate (180 tablets) treats an array of problems of the skin, hair and nails. Kali Sulph assists in speeding up the metabolism & prevents colds from setting in.

  • Excellent tissue oxygenator
  • Conditions the skin, hair & nails
  • Relieves dry, flaky problem skin, eczema, psoriasis & vitiligo
  • Treats Athlete’s Foot & fungal infections
  • Assists with hair loss and dandruff
  • When used in alternation with Ferrum Phos at the onset of colds, it can prevent it taking hold
  • Used after Ferrum Phos and Kali Mur to clear the last stage of infection if there is yellow-greenish mucous
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, babies and animals)

Ingredients

Kali Sulph D6

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Magnesium Phosphate (180 tablets) is the biochemic answer to tension, spasm and pain of the musculo-skeletal system, nervous system and the heart. 

  • Releases tension in muscles and nerves
  • Soothes tension, fear and exam stress
  • Helps with neuralgia, neuropathy, migraines & tension headaches
  • Relieves menstrual cramps, colic & digestive cramping
  • Helps pregnancy cramps in the calves
  • Stops hiccoughs
  • Reduces hunger cravings
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

Mag Phos D6

entry.title: Ferrum Phos Tissue Salt No.4 - Anti-Inflammatory & Oxygenation (60 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Ferrum Phos (60 tablets) is also known as the biochemic first-aid salt. Ferrum Phos is responsible for our ability and capacity to obtain Oxygen from the outside.

  • As an oxygen carrier and biochemic anti-inflammatory, it supports the immune system and facilitates the release of energy
  • Maintains muscular functional strength and is therefore supportive to athletes and healthy active children
  • Supports the function of the circulatory and immune systems and should be used to assist at the onset of all inflammatory conditions, i.e. ending in ‘itis’
  • Assists in reducing pain, fever, bruising, cuts, fatigue, headaches, anaemia, breathlessness and bleeding

Ingredients

Ferrum Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.title: Silicea Tissue Salt No.12 - Healthy Skin, Hair & Nails (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Silicea (180 tablets) strengthens, cleanses and conditions the connective tissues and helps to maintain healthy skin, hair and nails.

  • Deters premature ageing and improves the appearance of wrinkles
  • Cleanses the skin of boils, abscesses, styes and pimples, reduces scar tissue and keloids
  • Promotes well-being, tranquility and is helpful in stress-management
  • Improves involuntary twitching of eyes or muscles
  • Calms aggression, irritability and over-sensitivity to noise or light
  • Assists the body to remove foreign material that the body naturally would seek to eliminate*
  • Helps to calm whinging children
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

*We advise caution in extended usage of Silicea in situations where medication is prescribed to prevent the rejection of transplanted organs or artificial implants. In these cases, it is better to substitute with Bioplasma.

Ingredients

Silicea D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Nat Sulph Tissue Salt No.11 - Detox, Liver Tonic & Water Eliminator (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Natrum Sulphuricum (180 tablets) is an effective fluid and toxin eliminator that supports the function of the colon, hepato-biliary and lymphatic systems. 

  • Indicated for morning-afters, morning sickness and cellulite
  • counteract the effects of overindulgence (food and alcohol)
  • Promotes the excretion of excess fluid during the treatment of substance abuse and weight-loss
  • Helps with Metabolic Syndrome (sugar metabolic stress)
  • Reduces hot sweats & water retention
  • Assists in the treatment of jaundice
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

Ingredients

Nat Sulph D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Kali Mur Tissue Salt No.5 - Decongest Ears, Nose, Throat & Lungs (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Kali Muriaticum Tissue Salt (180 tablets) acts as a blood and mucous regulator and maintains fibrous tissues, supports the respiratory and lymphatic systems and is a metabolic activator.

  • Often required after Ferrum Phos to clear infections
  • Any mucous congestion, white-coloured phlegm or discharge indicates a Kali Mur requirement
  • Assists with travel sickness and nausea
  • Treats infantile eczema and adolescent pimples
  • Soothes eye infections, itchy eyes, irritates eyelids and allergies
  • Helps thrush and candida
  • Eases soft glandular swellings and sinus congestion, as well as ear, nose, throat and lunch infections
  • Useful for warts and skin tags
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, animals and babies)

Ingredients

Kali Mur D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.title: Kali Mur Tissue Salt No.5 - Decongest Ears, Nose, Throat & Lungs (60 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Kali Muriaticum Tissue Salt (60 tablets) acts as a blood and mucous regulator and maintains fibrous tissues, supports the respiratory and lymphatic systems and is a metabolic activator.

  • Often required after Ferrum Phos to clear infections
  • Any mucous congestion, white-coloured phlegm or discharge indicates a Kali Mur requirement
  • Assists with travel sickness and nausea
  • Treats infantile eczema and adolescent pimples
  • Soothes eye infections, itchy eyes, irritates eyelids and allergies
  • Helps thrush and candida
  • Eases soft glandular swellings and sinus congestion, as well as ear, nose, throat and lunch infections
  • Useful for warts and skin tags
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, animals and babies)

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

entry.title: Calc Sulph Tissue Salt No.3 - Tissue Salt for Cleansing, Purifying & Healing (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Calcium Sulphate (180 tablets) is a sugar-free tissue salt that acts as a systemic cleanser, skin purifier and wound healer.

  • Strengthens and maintains the integrity of cell membranes, preventing premature cell disintegration
  • Purifies blood - helps the liver to remove decaying organic products from the blood stream
  • Assist pimples, boils, abscesses, ulcerations, slow healing wounds and tendencies to mouth ulcers
  • Helps in conditions associated with the discharge of pus
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics and animals)

Ingredients

Calc Sulph D6.

Directions for use 

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
